thread.title: Kourtney Kardashian kisses son Reign in new photo
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian kisses son Reign in new photo - UPI.com

author: Annie Martin
title: Kourtney Kardashian kisses son Reign in new photo
text:
1 of 5 | License Photo LOS ANGELES, Oct. 16 (UPI) -- Kourtney Kardashian spent some quality time with son Reign on Friday.
The 31-year-old reality star doted on the 10-month-old baby after returning home from Lamar Odom 's bedside. The 35-year-old former NBA star, who remains legally married to Kardashian's sister, Khloe Kardashian , has been hospitalized in Las Vegas since Tuesday.
"Kisses in bed with my babies kind of morning," she captioned a photo of herself with Reign on Instagram. The reality star is also mother to 5-year-old son Mason and 3-year-old daughter Penelope with former partner Scott Disick , from whom she split in July.
Kardashian posted a picture of Mason with Odom on Thursday, writing, "Believing in the power of prayer for this beautiful soul." The former NBA player was found unconscious in the Love Ranch brothel, where he reportedly paid $75,000 for his visit.
The reality star, Khloe Kardashian and several family members rushed to Odom's side after the incident, with Kim Kardashian canceling her baby shower. A spokesperson for Odom's aunt, JaNean Mercer, told Entertainment Tonight her nephew was able to speak Friday.
1 of 2 Kourtney Kardashian shared a new photo with son Reign on Friday. Instagram /Kourtney Kardashian Kardashian and her family came to fame on E! series Keeping Up with the Kardashians , which will return for an 11th season Nov. 15. The reality star is parenting Reign, Penelope and Mason alone as Disick seeks treatment for substance abuse in Malibu, Calif.
  Scott Disick checks into rehab for drug and alcohol addiction Scott Disick on Kourtney Kardashian split: 'worst decision of my life' Reports: Odom conscious, breathing on his own in Las Vegas hospital Lamar Odom paid $75K for brothel visit, owner says
